channel.title: Simple Audio-In to Audio-Out sounds fuzzy and low volume
channel.description:
Hello,
Not sure if I'm dealing with a board problem or not, but I receiving my Axoloti and as a test I made a simple patch, Audio In Stereo to Audio Out Stereo. When I put audio in (from SP-404 sampler), the volume is fairly low even with the SP volume all the way up, and it has a lot of static at this volume. Not sure if this is a board issue or I'm missing something. Thanks!

item.title: Simple Audio-In to Audio-Out sounds fuzzy and low volume
item.dc:creator: @bpad68 Bobby
item.description:
@bpad68 wrote:

Thanks for your reply. I found the issue - the USB hub I was using was not supply enough power for the axoloti with a MIDI controller plugged in. Plugging the USB directly into my PC fixed the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Simple Audio-In to Audio-Out sounds fuzzy and low volume

item.title: Simple Audio-In to Audio-Out sounds fuzzy and low volume
item.dc:creator: @patatos angelo avogadri
item.description:
@patatos wrote:

Have you tried the audio/inconfig in the factory library? And check the stereo adapter you use from the output of the sp to the stereo input of the axo

Read full topic
